casebody.data:
HOCKNEY & ASSO.
v.
STATE of NC. No. 353P05-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for State et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of September 2006 by Plaintiff demanding Supreme Court to issue order to show true ownership of property: "Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006." Justice EDMUNDS recused.
